column1: Smoque BBQ////I love their St. Louis style ribs (I like my ribs meaty!)
column3: sausage and sliced brisket. Though everyone talks up the brisket
column4: its my least favorite of all that. Their macaroni and cheese is pretty damn good
column5: the chili with brisket is good as well. The beans are great as is the cornbread. I'm not a fan of the vinegar-y and onion-y coleslaw though. I wish they had collard greens
column6: that would be amazing and they would be just about my IDEAL BBQ place then.They have pretty good peach cobbler too.
